error.message: Class Drupal\apachesolr_multilingual\Tests\DefaultControllerTest was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.

Call to deprecated method getLabel() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use $entity->label() instead. This method used to escape the entity label. The render system's autoescape is now relied upon.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.

Declaration of Drupal\apachesolr_multilingual\Plugin\search_api\backend\SearchApiSolrMultilingualBackend::preQuery(Solarium\QueryType\Select\Query\Query $solarium_query, Drupal\search_api\Query\QueryInterface $query) should be compatible with Drupal\search_api_solr\Plugin\search_api\backend\SearchApiSolrBackend::preQuery(Solarium\Core\Query\QueryInterface $solarium_query, Drupal\search_api\Query\QueryInterface $query)
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to apachesolr_multilingual.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
